column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza was made to order and took about 30 mins to be served. The Malnati's Â special consisted of lean sausage
column4: and buttered crust. Other had claimed that the buttered crust was what made Lou's stood out from the rest of deep dish chains in the city. From our tasting
column5: I thought the crust tasted like stale
column6: crusty corn bread. The filling was fine. Sausage was sausage
column8: cheese was cheese. Definitely not worth wasting an entire meal for this. I will eat my papa john's
